name: Stealth Prototype (2014)
description:
• Move: WASD / arrow keys
  • Sneak: space / E
  • Bomb: shift / F

A stealth game with bright and claustrophobic environments. Move to one of the squares on the start screen to pick a level. Numbered squares are the objective, but don't expect much to happen when you collect them. Walls are destructible by bombs. Try different approaches out.

Started in 2014, put on hold, recently picked up development again. This is the game I've most consistently wanted to revisit and expand since then, and I hope someday I can finish it. For now, here's what I had way back when, without any revisions. Please excuse the mess :)
